name: Fort Crimson
description: A partially overrun military outpost that once served as a regional command center. The outer perimeter is compromised, but the armory and underground bunker may still hold valuable supplies. Bloodstains and spent shell casings suggest a last stand occurred here. The base's floodlights still flicker intermittently, casting eerie shadows across the compound.

points_of_interest.name: Main Gate
points_of_interest.description: Breached entrance with overturned Humvees and sandbag barricades

points_of_interest.name: Armory
points_of_interest.description: Heavily fortified building with potential weapons cache

points_of_interest.name: Command Center
points_of_interest.description: Destroyed communications hub with possible intel

points_of_interest.name: Barracks
points_of_interest.description: Living quarters with personal effects and potential supplies

points_of_interest.name: Underground Bunker
points_of_interest.description: Sealed blast doors lead to potentially untouched supplies

special_features: Functional floodlights create shifting safe zones
Motion-activated turrets may still be operational
Underground tunnel system connects key buildings
Zombies in military uniforms have enhanced armor
